sentences.english: So they were shut up unto the day of their death, living in widowhood.
sentences.chinese: 她們如同寡婦被禁，直到死的日子。

sentences.english: So the widow one day entreated me to sing it to her thus.
sentences.chinese: 因此這位寡婦有一天請求我用這調子唱給她聽。

sentences.english: Woods never liked the black widow this is gratitude toward her smiling.
sentences.chinese: 嗚茲從來都不喜歡黑寡婦，這次卻感激地朝着她笑了。

sentences.english: A father of the fatherless, and a judge of the widows, is God in his holy habitation.
sentences.chinese: 神在他的聖所作孤兒的父，作寡婦的伸冤者。

sentences.english: In the morning the Anglo-Indian widow sent for me to breakfast.
sentences.chinese: 第二天早上這位英裔印度官員的寡婦請我去喫早飯。

sentences.english: You should practice playing the grieving widow.
sentences.chinese: 你應該練習扮演一名悲痛的寡婦。

sentences.english: If the husband or the wife dies, may the other marry again?
sentences.chinese: 夫婦二人中死了一個，單夫寡婦還能婚配麼？

sentences.english: Lk. 21:2 And He saw a certain impoverished widow casting there two lepta .
sentences.chinese: 路二一2又見一個赤貧的寡婦，投了兩個小錢。

sentences.english: She is a widow, and I can not let her widow.
sentences.chinese: 她已經是個寡婦了，我不能讓她守活寡。

sentences.english: Some of these widows are teenagers — or even younger.
sentences.chinese: 一些寡婦仍然是少女，有的甚至更年輕。

sentences.english: Widow Douglas is trying to civilize me?and I won't stand for that.
sentences.chinese: 道格拉斯寡婦想要教化我，那我可受不了。

sentences.english: The black widow and brown recluse are both venomous spiders.
sentences.chinese: 黑寡婦球腹蛛和褐皮花蛛都是有毒蜘蛛。

sentences.english: Mr. Eberling is in prison for the 1984 murder of an elderly widow.
sentences.chinese: 埃伯林由於在1984年謀殺一個老年寡婦而入獄。

sentences.english: The sorrowful widow begged for mercy.
For those without relatives to take them in, there are few options.
sentences.chinese: 那些沒有親戚可以投奔的寡婦則很少有選擇的餘地。

sentences.english: Black widows are solitary year-round except during this violent mating ritual.
sentences.chinese: 黑寡婦除了這一兇暴的交配過程以外終年獨居。

definition: to be cut off from the rest of the world (idiom)
daughter-in-law/wife (of a younger man)/young married woman/young woman
